name: Rozzindahk
description:
Lore of the Earth
The Rozzindahk are a stout-folk culture that works the soil, from farmers to miners. They are renowned for their metalwork, tavern prowess, and connection to the earth.

options.name: Throwing Arm
options.description: You make a Throwing Attack with a +2 Bonus to Attack and double the Range you can normally throw that object or weapon. Additionally, a True Hit on this Attack is upgraded to a Critical Hit.

options.name: Tavern Tales
options.description: Gain +1 Expression and your stories in taverns earn you free drinks and lodging.

options.name: Earth's Bounty
options.description: Gain +1 Wildcraft and you can find edible roots and mushrooms even in barren lands.
